11311.content:

info.brief_description: You gain the ability to swap things. What do you do now?
info.description:
I know there are a lot of these here already, but I decided to have my own take at one of these.

These are my rules. Please try to follow them.
- CHECK YOUR GRAMMAR
- Try to not go for full body swaps (I'm not restricting this, but it's more fun if you take parts from different people).
- Make sure the story makes sense, don't ramdomly start doing something else.
- Don't go making eternal 'choice-other' chapters.
- No one-scentence chapters. Add something to the story.
- Stay in second person (you) and try to only switch POV when it's relevant to the story
- Most importantly, be creative and add!

Characters:

Martin (you), 16, male.
Michelle (your sister), 8, female
Alex (your sister), 21, female
Cindy (your mom), 47, female

Feel free to add more, this is just a start. How they act and all is totally up to you or the person using them in your parent chapters. Have fun writing!
